prereq.p: The item used has to meet the Bench Crafting requirements. There must be enough orbs of the required type for the recipe in the player's inventory.

step.cmd: Click on the Crafting Bench to open the crafting options window.

taskbody.example: Place an armor into the Crafting Bench and choose Add Six Linked Sockets To An Item. According to the recipe requirements, 1500 Orbs of Fusing from your inventory will be consumed, and the armor will receive six linked sockets of random colors.
taskbody.postreq: Use Chromatic Orbs to change the sockets' color to match your gems' colors.
